Summarised Lesion Count Data

Source: R/lesion_counts.R
lesion_counts.Rd

A dataset of summarised chickpea ascochyta blight lesions from experimental plots located at Horsham and Curyo.

lesion_counts

Format

A data.frame with 336 rows and 17 variables:

SpEv

Spread event. An identifier that includes the site and replicate number

site

Location where trial was located

rep

Replicate number. The sequential number of rain or irrigation event for a given site

distance

Distance of station locations along transect from infected plot source in metres

station

Number assigned to each respective station at a given distance on a given transect

transect

Number identifying one of ten transects upon which the stations were placed

plant_no

Number identifying a given plant in a pot

pot_no

Number identifying a given pot

counts_p1

Total recorded number of lesions on a given plant within the specified pot

counts_p2

Total recorded number of lesions on a given plant within the specified pot

counts_p3

Total recorded number of lesions on a given plant within the specified pot

counts_p4

Total recorded number of lesions on a given plant within the specified pot

counts_p5

Total recorded number of lesions on a given plant within the specified pot

degrees

Compass degrees for a given transect

ptype

Type of precipitation for an event, one of three, rainfall, irrigation or mixed

mean_pot_count

Mean value of lesion counts per plant in the specified pot

Source

GRDC Project USQ1903-003-RTX

Contents

Developed by Ihsanul Khaliq, Joshua Fanning, Paul Melloy, Jean Galloway, Kevin Moore, Daniel Burrell, Adam H. Sparks, GRDC Project USQ1903-003RTX, Agriculture Victoria and GRDC co-investment project DAV00150, GRDC Project DJP1097-001RTX.
